sourcesContent:
<template>
    <nav>
   <v-list>
        <v-list-item 
          v-for="item in menuItems"
           :key="item.title"
           router :to="item.path"
            :id="item.title"
         >
          <v-list-item-action>
            <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-action>
          <v-list-item-content>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
  
</nav>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "Navbar", 
  data() {
  return{
   menuItems: [
          // { title: 'Yeni mÃ¼qavilÉ™lÉ™r', path: '/', icon: 'add_to_photos'   },
          { title: 'Ä°craya hazÄ±r mÃ¼qavilÉ™lÉ™rðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£', path: '/', icon: 'add_to_photos' },
          { title: 'Ä°crada olan mÃ¼qavilÉ™lÉ™r', path: '/completed', icon: 'library_books' },
          { title: 'Arxiv', path: '/archive', icon: 'dns' },
          { title: 'TÉ™ÅŸkilati struktur', path: '/structure', icon: 'account_tree' },
          { title: 'Ä°nsan resurslarÄ±', path: '/hr', icon: 'folder_shared' },
          { title: 'Ä°stifadÉ™Ã§ilÉ™r', path: '/users', icon: 'people' }
     ]
  }
}
}
</script>

<style scoped>
nav{
   box-shadow: 0 0 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  background-color: #ffffff;
  text-align: center;
  margin-top:64px;
  z-index: 1;
}
  .v-list-item{

    display: inline-flex;
}

.v-list-item__action{
   margin-right:5px!important;
}

.v-list{
  margin: auto;
  padding: 0px!important;
}
 
.v-list i, .v-list-item__content{
 color: #1e88e5!important;
 
  font-size: 16px!important;
  font-weight: 600!important;
}

.v-list-item__action, .v-list-item__avatar, .v-list-item__icon{
  min-width: 10px!important;
}
.v-list .v-list-item--active {
     
    color: #585a5d;
}
</style>
